Hero.title: Welcome to Amicizia Life Science
Hero.subtitle: A noble cause to serve the livestock with scientific, technical and clinical solutions.

WhyUs.title: Why AMICIZIA
WhyUs.subtitle: Committed to excellence in veterinary pharmaceutical solutions

About.title: ABOUT US
About.description: Amicizia Life Science is committed to become a trusted & admired player in Poultry, Livestock & Aqua culture sector by offering unique & quality products to customers. We are dedicated to bring new solutions and offer unique products manufactured at GMP & ISO accredited sterile manufacturing facility for Veterinary use.

checklist.compliance: Compliance to Legal, Statutory & Regulatory requirement

MissionVision.mission_desc: To offer unique veterinary pharmaceuticals & nutritional products developed in a creative & innovative way, under high quality standards that allows us to provide the best solution to offer our end customers.
MissionVision.vision_desc: To be one of the leading Animal Health Pharmaceutical Companies, not only in sales but also in innovation, value creation and process excellence with high sense of social responsibility.

team.title: TEAM
team.desc: A group of likeminded people demonstrating unique talents while striving for success.

professionalism.title: PROFESSIONALISM
professionalism.desc: Embodied by Integrity, Honesty & Respect in all our business dealings.

excellence.title: EXCELLENCE
excellence.desc: Commitment to reach above and beyond to deliver unsurpassed achievements.

quality.title: QUALITY
quality.desc: Superior quality products with stringent checks at every manufacturing stage.

Products.description: Discover our scientifically formulated range of veterinary products designed for superior livestock, poultry, and companion animal health.
